channel.title: Comments on: Chillispot Howto
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: aries
item.dc:creator: aries
item.description:
> Chillispot then sets up a DHCP server (this can be disabled from the chillispot conf file) on the tun0 interface.
How to disable the DHCP server provided by chillispot ?
item.content:encoded:
> Chillispot then sets up a DHCP server (this can be disabled from the chillispot conf file) on the tun0 interface.

How to disable the DHCP server provided by chillispot ?

item.title: By: Gunther
item.dc:creator: Gunther
item.description: I found the file in the old repos from Ubuntu server 8.04. Download the source files for freeradius ( any version before 2 should have it ) and it would be in there.
item.content:encoded: I found the file in the old repos from Ubuntu server 8.04. Download the source files for freeradius ( any version before 2 should have it ) and it would be in there.

item.title: By: Gunther
item.dc:creator: Gunther
item.description:
Hi, I have been trying for the past week or so to get chillispot working but have come stuck at the point where you propergate database with tables created by the maker's of freeradius.
Suppose to run the comand: zcat /usr/share/doc/freeradius/examples/mysql.sql.gz | mysql -u root -p radius
Each time I try it it say the .gz file does not exist. Which is true and I have so far been unable to find it.
Using ubuntu 9.04 Sever and stuck
Pleaaaase help!!
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I have been trying for the past week or so to get chillispot working but have come stuck at the point where you propergate database with tables created by the maker’s of freeradius.

Suppose to run the comand:
zcat /usr/share/doc/freeradius/examples/mysql.sql.gz | mysql -u root -p radius

Each time I try it it say the .gz file does not exist. Which is true and I have so far been unable to find it.

Using ubuntu 9.04 Sever and stuck

Pleaaaase help!!

item.title: By: tkrag
item.dc:creator: tkrag
item.description: <p>I never got around to completing the tutorial with the mysql stuff. It's pretty complicated, but if there's an interest, i'll try and setup the hardware again, and see if i can't finish it some day soon.</p>
item.content:encoded: I never got around to completing the tutorial with the mysql stuff. It’s pretty complicated, but if there’s an interest, i’ll try and setup the hardware again, and see if i can’t finish it some day soon.

item.title: By: wong
item.dc:creator: wong
item.description: <p>chillispot.info is up, however it seems that the forums were lost...as in all the example configs and everything else...sigh.</p>
item.content:encoded: chillispot.info is up, however it seems that the forums were lost…as in all the example configs and everything else…sigh.

item.title: By: Chillispot
item.dc:creator: Chillispot
item.description: <p>The official homepage can be found now at chillispot.info</p>
item.content:encoded: The official homepage can be found now at chillispot.info
